itemListElement.name: Creative Work
itemListElement.description: The most generic kind of creative work, including books, movies, photographs, software programs, etc.
itemListElement.author: Alan Smithee

itemListElement.name: Article
itemListElement.description: An article, such as a news article or piece of investigative report. Newspapers and magazines have articles of many different types and this is intended to cover them all.
itemListElement.author: Alan Smithee
itemListElement.articleBody:
Hello, this is an article.
